00016 package WeBWorK::Authen::Shibboleth;
00017 use base qw/WeBWorK::Authen/;
00018 
00019 =head1 NAME
00020 
00021 WeBWorK::Authen::Shibboleth - Authentication plug in for Shibboleth. 
00022 This is basd on Cosign.pm
00023 
00024 For documentation, please refer to http://webwork.maa.org/wiki/External_(Shibboleth)_Authentication
00025 
00026 to use: include in global.conf or course.conf
00027   $authen{user_module} = "WeBWorK::Authen::Shibboleth";
00028 and add /webwork2/courseName as a Shibboleth Protected
00029 Location
00030 
00031 if $r->ce->{shiboff} is set for a course, authentication reverts
00032 to standard WeBWorK authentication.
00033 
00034 add the following to global.conf to setup the Shibboleth
00035   
00036 $shibboleth{logout_script} = "/Shibboleth.sso/Logout"?return=".$server_root_url.$webwork_url; # return URL after logout
00037 $shibboleth{session_header} = "Shib-Session-ID"; # the header to identify if there is an existing shibboleth session
00038 $shibboleth{manage_session_timeout} = 1; # allow shib to manage session time instead of webwork
00039 $shibboleth{hash_user_id_method} = "MD5"; # possible values none, MD5. Use it when you want to hide real user_ids from showing in url. 
00040 $shibboleth{hash_user_id_salt} = ""; # salt for hash function
00041 #define mapping between shib and webwork
00042 $shibboleth{mapping}{user_id} = "username";
00043 
00044 =cut
00045 
00046 use strict;
00047 use warnings;
00048 use WeBWorK::Debug;
00049 use Data::Dumper;
00050 
00051 # this is similar to the method in the base class, except that Shibboleth
00052 # ensures that we don't get to the address without a login.  this means
00053 # that we can't allow guest logins, but don't have to do any password
00054 # checking or cookie management.
00055 
00056 sub get_credentials {
00057     my ($self) = @_;
00058     my $r = $self->{r};
00059     my $ce = $r->ce;
00060     my $db = $r->db;
00061     
00062     if ( $ce->{shiboff} || $r->param('bypassShib')) {
00063         return $self->SUPER::get_credentials( @_ );
00064     } else {
00065         debug("Shib is on!");
00066 
00067         # set external auth parameter so that Login.pm knows
00068         #    not to rely on internal logins if there's a check_user
00069         #    failure.
00070         $self->{external_auth} = 1;
00071 
00072         if ( $r->param("user") && ! $r->param("force_passwd_authen") ) {
00073             return $self->SUPER::get_credentials( @_ );
00074         }
00075         
00076         if ( defined ($ENV{$ce->{shibboleth}{session_header}}) && defined( $ENV{$ce->{shibboleth}{mapping}{user_id}} ) ) {
00077             debug('Got shib header and user_id');
00078             my $user_id = $ENV{$ce->{shibboleth}{mapping}{user_id}};
00079             if ( defined ($ce->{shibboleth}{hash_user_id_method}) && 
00080                  $ce->{shibboleth}{hash_user_id_method} ne "none" && 
00081                  $ce->{shibboleth}{hash_user_id_method} ne "" ) {
00082                 use Digest;
00083                 my $digest  = Digest->new($ce->{shibboleth}{hash_user_id_method});
00084                 $digest->add(uc($user_id). ( defined $ce->{shibboleth}{hash_user_id_salt} ? $ce->{shibboleth}{hash_user_id_salt} : ""));
00085                 $user_id = $digest->hexdigest;
00086             }
00087             $self->{'user_id'} = $user_id;
00088             $self->{r}->param("user", $user_id);
00089 
00090             # set external auth parameter so that login.pm
00091             #    knows not to rely on internal logins if
00092             #    there's a check_user failure.
00093             $self->{session_key}   = undef;
00094             $self->{password}      = "youwouldneverpickthispassword";
00095             $self->{login_type}    = "normal";
00096             $self->{credential_source} = "params";
00097         } else {
00098             debug("Couldn't shib header or user_id");
00099             return 0;
00100         }
00101 
00102         # the session key isn't used (Shibboleth is managing this 
00103         #    for us), and we want to force checking against the 
00104         #    site_checkPassword
00105         $self->{'session_key'} = undef;
00106         $self->{'password'} = 1;
00107         $self->{'credential_source'} = "params";
00108 
00109         return 1;
00110     }
00111 }
00112 
00113 sub site_checkPassword { 
00114     my ( $self, $userID, $clearTextPassword ) = @_;
00115 
00116     if ( $self->{r}->ce->{shiboff} ) {
00117         return $self->SUPER::checkPassword( @_ );
00118     } else {
00119         # this is easy; if we're here at all, we've authenticated
00120         # through shib
00121         return 1;
00122     }
00123 }
00124 
00125 # disable cookie functionality
00126 sub maybe_send_cookie {
00127     my ($self, @args) = @_;
00128     if ( $self->{r}->ce->{shiboff} ) {
00129         return $self->SUPER::maybe_send_cookie( @_ );
00130     } else {
00131         # nothing to do here
00132     }
00133 }
00134 sub fetchCookie {
00135     my ($self, @args) = @_;
00136     if ( $self->{r}->ce->{shiboff} ) {
00137         return $self->SUPER::fetchCookie( @_ );
00138     } else {
00139         # nothing to do here
00140     }
00141 }
00142 sub sendCookie {
00143     my ($self, @args) = @_;
00144     if ( $self->{r}->ce->{shiboff} ) {
00145         return $self->SUPER::sendCookie( @_ );
00146     } else {
00147         # nothing to do here
00148     }
00149 }
00150 sub killCookie {
00151     my ($self, @args) = @_;
00152     if ( $self->{r}->ce->{shiboff} ) {
00153         return $self->SUPER::killCookie( @_ );
00154     } else {
00155         # nothing to do here
00156     }
00157 }

00159 # this is a bit of a cheat, because it does the redirect away from the
00160 #   logout script or what have you, but I don't see a way around that.
00161 sub forget_verification { 
00162     my ($self, @args) = @_;
00163     my $r = $self->{r};
00164 
00165     if ( $r->ce->{shiboff} ) {
00166         return $self->SUPER::forget_verification( @_ );
00167     } else {
00168         $self->{was_verified} = 0;
00169         $self->{redirect} = $r->ce->{shibboleth}{logout_script};
00170     }
00171 }
00172 
00173 # returns ($sessionExists, $keyMatches, $timestampValid)
00174 # if $updateTimestamp is true, the timestamp on a valid session is updated
00175 # override function: allow shib to handle the session time out
00176 sub check_session {
00177     my ($self, $userID, $possibleKey, $updateTimestamp) = @_;
00178     my $ce = $self->{r}->ce;
00179     my $db = $self->{r}->db;
00180     
00181     if ( $ce->{shiboff} ) {
00182         return $self->SUPER::check_session( @_ );
00183     } else {
00184         my $Key = $db->getKey($userID); # checked
00185             return 0 unless defined $Key;
00186 
00187         my $keyMatches = (defined $possibleKey and $possibleKey eq $Key->key);
00188         my $timestampValid = (time <= $Key->timestamp()+$ce->{sessionKeyTimeout});
00189         if ($ce->{shibboleth}{manage_session_timeout}) {
00190             # always valid to allow shib to take control of timeout
00191             $timestampValid = 1;
00192         }
00193 
00194         if ($keyMatches and $timestampValid and $updateTimestamp) {
00195             $Key->timestamp(time);
00196             $db->putKey($Key);
00197         }
00198         return (1, $keyMatches, $timestampValid);
00199     }
00200 }
